about_the_game:
Deepest World is a coding sandbox MMORPG where you can write your character's AI with JavaScript. Explore an endless open world, hunt monsters and bosses, craft deep builds and items, acquire programming skills, grind 24/7.

The main goal is to program a bot that plays the game for you. To do so, we provide you with a client-side web API which exposes data objects that represent your surroundings, API call functions to communicate with the server, and some utility functions.

Free Trial

Deepest World can be played for free with skill point cap of 10. The trial is designed to provide a meaningful preview of the full experience, so that you can make an informed decision before making a purchase. To access the complete game, you can buy Premium Time. We hope you enjoy the trial and look forward to having you join us.

Early Access

The game is still in the relatively early stages of development, and many features are being designed, implemented, and tested. As such, you may encounter bugs, unfinished content, or changes to gameplay mechanics. Your feedback and bug reports are always welcome and greatly appreciated. Thank you for your understanding and support as the game continues to be improved.

Feature Overview

  • Scripting with Deepest World's JavaScript API

  • A non-instanced procedurally generated 3D open world

  • A single server that can support hundreds of concurrent players

  • Procedurally generated skills and gear

  • PVE with normal, rare and unique monsters

  • Crafting and gathering professions

  • Uncapped levels

  • Missions with party finder
